parts.text: create a React application with 3 buttons. Output just the App.jsx file.
create a React application with 3 buttons. Use tailwind CSS 3 for styling. Output just the App.jsx file.
change the color of the button to red, orange and yellow. Output just the App.jsx file.
add one different icon in each button. Just output App.jsx file

import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function App() { const [counts, setCounts] = useState({ 1: 0, 2: 0, 3: 0 }); const [last, setLast] = useState(''); const handleClick = (n) => { setCounts(prev => ({ ...prev, [n]: (prev[n] ?? 0) + 1 })); setLast(`Button ${n} clicked`); }; return (
Last action: {last || 'None'}
Counts:
Button 1: {counts[1]}
Button 2: {counts[2]}
Button 3: {counts[3]}
); }
add a text about Music using `react-markdown`. Output just App.jsx file

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown'; export default function App() { const [counts, setCounts] = useState({ 1: 0, 2: 0, 3: 0 }); const [last, setLast] = useState(''); const markdown = ` # Music Music is the art of arranging sounds in time to produce a composition that expresses ideas and emotions. It transcends language and can bring people together. - It spans many genres from classical to contemporary - It can be enjoyed alone or with others - It fuels memories and inspires movement `; const handleClick = (n) => { setCounts(prev => ({ ...prev, [n]: (prev[n] ?? 0) + 1 })); setLast(`Button ${n} clicked`); }; return (
Last action: {last || 'None'}
Counts:
Button 1: {counts[1]}
Button 2: {counts[2]}
Button 3: {counts[3]}
Music
{markdown}
); }
add a nice photo with Daft Punk bellow the text about music. Output just the App.jsx file.

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown'; export default function App() { const [counts, setCounts] = useState({ 1: 0, 2: 0, 3: 0 }); const [last, setLast] = useState(''); const markdown = ` # Music Music is the art of arranging sounds in time to produce a composition that expresses ideas and emotions. It transcends language and can bring people together. - It spans many genres from classical to contemporary - It can be enjoyed alone or with others - It fuels memories and inspires movement `; // Daft Punk photo (licensed image from Wikimedia Commons) const daftImg = 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0b/Daft_Punk_Paris_2010.jpg/640px-Daft_Punk_Paris_2010.jpg'; const handleClick = (n) => { setCounts(prev => ({ ...prev, [n]: (prev[n] ?? 0) + 1 })); setLast(`Button ${n} clicked`); }; return (
Last action: {last || 'None'}
Counts:
Button 1: {counts[1]}
Button 2: {counts[2]}
Button 3: {counts[3]}
Music
{markdown}
); }
use an image with a proper URL instead of the previous one. Output just the App.jsx file

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown'; export default function App() { const [counts, setCounts] = useState({ 1: 0, 2: 0, 3: 0 }); const [last, setLast] = useState(''); const markdown = ` # Music Music is the art of arranging sounds in time to produce a composition that expresses ideas and emotions. It transcends language and can bring people together. - It spans many genres from classical to contemporary - It can be enjoyed alone or with others - It fuels memories and inspires movement `; // Proper image URL const daftImg = 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500530855697-b586d89ba3ee?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1200&q=60'; const handleClick = (n) => { setCounts(prev => ({ ...prev, [n]: (prev[n] ?? 0) + 1 })); setLast(`Button ${n} clicked`); }; return (
Last action: {last || 'None'}
Counts:
Button 1: {counts[1]}
Button 2: {counts[2]}
Button 3: {counts[3]}
Music
{markdown}
); }
